text: Józef Grzesiak (18 February 1941 – 30 May 2020) was a Polish boxer. He was born in Popów, Greater Poland Voivodeship, Poland. He competed for Poland in the 1964 Summer Olympics held in Tokyo, Japan. He finished in third place, winning a bronze medal. Grzesiak died of dementia-related problems in Warsaw on 30 May 2020, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== *Sports-reference Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Poland Category:Polish boxers Category:Greater Poland Voivodeship
title: Józef Grzesiak (boxer)
